title: Bug 37933Bugs in Tomcat
description: Bug 37933Bugs in Tomcat this format was working well in tomcat and allweb,application servers.But the values set by me were : setAttribute("mano",ss),getPropertyname="mano"useBean id="mano1". But in my case it is working inTOMCAT. The same code is not working in WEBLOGIC.
